entry.title: OriginalTestTest8
entry.summary: Naming and Path .\assets\img\sample\paulie.jpg Test 3 Create a new file named YYYY-MM-DD-TITLE.EXTENSION and put it in the _posts/ of the root directory. Please note that the EXTENSION must be one of md and markdown. Front Matter Basically, you need to fill the Front Matter as below at the top of the post: --- title: TITLE date: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS +/-TTTT categories: [TOP_CATEGORIE, SUB_...
